metadata.title: CVE-2019-12407 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: On Apache JSPWiki, up to version 2.11.0.M4, a carefully crafted plugin linkinvocation could trigger an XSS vulnerability on Apache JSPWiki, related tothe remember parameter on some of the JSPs, which could allow the attackerto execute javascript in the victim's browser and get some sensitiveinformation about the victim.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
